Alright, everyone, chills out. So basically, after Kataokasan uploaded these works about tortuing Exu, everyone in China goes ape shits on him and tracking down his address, some even throw the rocks at his house, and some even wait for him outside the house in hope of beating him if he went out. After that Kataokasan went on shadow by closed all of his accounts in every social platform, some people in Bilibili assumed that he was either commited suicide or just left his family and China and went to work on other places.

@rain13245 In short, Exu was set as a support unit and other doctors took out their aggression on not being able to pull Exu that they beat her up and raped her. The original doctor found out in a recording what happened to her and decided to take out his own aggression on Exu who had gotten pregnant by other men (He has a huge obsession about her). Exu gets her mind completely destroyed after being drugged and raped being confined in doctor's home. Afterwards, the doctor shows Texas what Exu was currently like after being confronted about why she has been missing. Then the doctor decides to throw Exu away to other doctors since his missions keep failing without her since she was great at clearing drones/mobs.
